President Bush 's nominee to join the increasingly conservative Supreme Court

Thomas at a Catholic school in segregated Savannah
a Yale law student from 1971 to 1974
Thomaschief supporter in the Senate , then the Republican state attorney general , Thomas attitudes
the Republican state attorney general , Thomas attitudes
Thomas , who has declined to be interviewed since his Supreme Court nomination
the ruler-slapping discipline of the nuns who taught Thomas at a Catholic school in segregated Savannah

the ruler-slapping discipline of the nuns who taught Thomas at a Catholic school in segregated Savannah , Ga. , the racial anger in the writings of Richard Wright and Malcolm X , the iconoclastic theories of such academicians as Thomas Sowell and William Barclay Allen , even the protest lyrics of singer-songwriter Nina Simone all are parts of the story
the protest lyrics of singer-songwriter Nina Simone all are parts of the story
